dcterms:creator: V. Ramanishka

dcterms:description: The HDD is the largest dataset in the field, providing 104-hour egocentric videos with frame-level annotations of tactical driver behavior. It includes diverse scenarios where complicated interactions happen between the ego vehicle and road users.
dcterms:title: Honda Research Institute Driving Dataset (HDD)

A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The Kinetics dataset is a large-scale dataset for human action recognition, containing a diverse set of video clips for various human actions.
dcterms:title: Kinetics Dataset
